description.value:
Common Craftsmanship replaces a normal leg in all funcitonality. Poor reduces movement rate by 1 and user must make an Agility Test after Running or fall over. Good Craftsmanship grants user Sprint Talent and +20 to Athletics Tests to Jump or Leap.

Requirements

Damage works as normal, although inappropriate effects like bleeding just render limb useless

Effect: Scarce

Notes: -
